about.title: About
about.subtitle: A modern calendar application with 2025 design
about.description: is a modern application for managing events and appointments with a user interface inspired by 2025 UI/UX standards.
about.projectHistory: This project is a deep refactoring of the original 'Calendar' project, completely rebuilt using the bl-custom-fe-react boilerplate as a base, but with significant improvements in architecture, UI/UX and functionality.
about.projectCapabilities: The application offers multiple calendar views (day, week, month), complete event management, data persistence, and import/export functionality for data backup.
about.readyToUse: Ready to use this application? Explore the various views (day, week, month) and start adding your events!
about.customizeInterface: You can customize the interface in the settings, choosing between light and dark theme, and selecting your favorite color palette.
